subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Betty Eaton, an 81-year-old Yankees fan from Myrtle Beach, S.C., is saddened that Mickey Mantle’s old stamping ground will soon be demolished.
snippet: Betty Eaton, an 81-year-old Yankees fan from Myrtle Beach, S.C., is saddened that Mickey Mantle’s old stamping ground will soon be demolished.
